citations.narrative:
The floor in the shelter structure in one of the outdoor pens housing 6 dogs was in need of repair. There were 3 areas of
the floor where the epoxy was missing and underlying wood was exposed. Two of the areas were approximately 10
inches x 5 inches in size and one area was approximately 4 feet x 1 foot in size. The licensee stated repair was scheduled
in a few weeks.
Worn floors with exposed wood cannot be adequately cleaned and sanitized and may result in increased disease
transmission.
Surfaces of outdoor housing facilities, including houses and dens, must be replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by: September 4, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.4(c) 
   
Outdoor housing facilities. 
The floor in the shelter structure in one of the outdoor pens housing 6 dogs was in need of repair. There were 3 areas of 
the floor where the epoxy was missing and underlying wood was exposed. Two of the areas were approximately 10 
inches x 5 inches in size and one area was approximately 4 feet x 1 foot in size. The licensee stated repair was scheduled 
in a few weeks. 
Worn floors with exposed wood cannot be adequately cleaned and sanitized and may result in increased disease 
transmission. 
Surfaces of outdoor housing facilities, including houses and dens, must be replaced when worn or soiled. 
Correct by: September 4, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
